NSCameraUsageDescription: Camera access is used to capture your geo-referenced photos.
NSContactsUsageDescription: Contact access is used to pick up contact references from the field.
NSCalendarsUsageDescription: Calendar access is used to pick up field date references.
NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: The photo library access is used to store your field photos.
NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Microphone access is used to record your observations from the field.
NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Access to location during use and in background helps to show the user's tracking through the field.
NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: Continuous access to the location helps to create perimeters around a farm field and to make guided soil collections.
NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Location access is used to show exact user's position in farm fields.
AuditBreeder-Title: Qual é o obtentor da tecnologia?
